definition: sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
variant of 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]/nicotine
choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)

sentences.english: It is also a better Lewis base.
sentences.chinese: 氙也是較好的路易斯鹼。

sentences.english: The different substituents on the aryl ketones determined the different base used in the reactions.
sentences.chinese: 芳基酮上的取代基決定了合成中所用鹼的類型。

sentences.english: HPLC method for the determination of stachydrine hydrochloride in Yimucao tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法測定益母草片中鹽酸水蘇鹼的含量。

sentences.english: Evaluate the usage of radical scavengers in alkali burns of cornea.
sentences.chinese: 探討角膜鹼燒傷後自由基清除劑治療機制。

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化物包括實驗室和工業過程中常用的鹼。

sentences.english: Soluble metallic hydroxides are bases that are alkalies .
sentences.chinese: 可溶解的金屬氫氧化合物都是鹼。

sentences.english: If TOTM is neutralized & washed with alkaline alcohol solution, then its acid-value will be come down validly.
sentences.chinese: 採用鹼的乙醇溶液可以有效降低產品酸值。

sentences.english: HPLC method was established for the determination of gramine.
sentences.chinese: 建立測定蘆竹鹼的高效液相色譜法。

sentences.english: The findings would be helpful to guide the treatment of alkali burns.
sentences.chinese: 這一次發現有助於指導鹼燒傷的治療。

sentences.english: Pidan is prepared from raw duck egg by alkaline treatment.
sentences.chinese: 皮蛋是生鴨蛋經由鹼處理而製成的。

sentences.english: The results showed that pilocarpine was also an inhibitor of platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現毛果芸香鹼也是血小板聚集的抑制劑。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the mechanism by which berberine decreases the blood glucose level in normal mice.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了小檗鹼降低正常小鼠血糖的作用機制。

sentences.english: An acid can react with a base to form a salt.
sentences.chinese: 酸與鹼產生化學反應而形成鹽。

sentences.english: The performance change of core-spun yarn and blended yarn after alkali treatment were compared.
sentences.chinese: 對比分析了鹼處理後包芯紗和混和紗性能的變化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of oil on alkali corneal burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究油劑對角膜鹼燒傷的治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of trigonelline in Radix Mirabilis.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定胃必舒膠囊中胡椒鹼的含量。
